name: Idle Shark World - Tycoon Game
description:
Welcome to the Idle Shark game! Idle Shark is a fantastic idle, tap, and clicker game with shark simulator elements. Take control of the hungry White Shark and go to the ocean and seas to grow your skill by eating everything on your way! Fully ragdoll and physics system gives you madness in the game. You can eat everything that you see in the ocean: humans, divers, seagulls, boats, yachts, and even big container ships! Your Shark can jump from the water that allows you to eat some flying stuff like Helicopters and Planes. Explore a beautiful ocean and sea worlds and evolve your sharks to the Megaladon or Hammer shark.

Sharks Evolution
Evolve your sharks to increase your power in the ocean. Each Shark has unique bonuses and effects that can help you to increase your profit and strength.

Upgrades system
Upgrade strength to increase shark jaws strength and attack power, size to grow up your Shark and eat more significant objects and speed to grow your swimming velocity

Boss fight system
To start unlocking new ocean and seas, you can begin Boss Fight with the most different enemies on your way. Fight with surfers, boats, whales, dolphins, and other opponents to become the ocean's biggest King.


Features:
-Free to Play
-Beautiful infinity 3D world
-Realistics Environment
-Realistics physics character
-Ragdoll humans
-Sharkando mode
-More than 10+ seas and oceans
-1000+ different objects to eat
-Idle mechanics with Shark auto-swimming mode
